works.description:
My company, Pixelan, is a 16-year old US company that creates and sells video editing plug-ins, which are named SpiceFX for Movie Maker, SpiceMaster, CreativEase, 3D Six-Pack, and AnyFX. These are all downloadable software products that are sold via our website... www.pixelan.com

In the box below are URLS that are appearing high in Google search results are from infringing sources distributing/selling "cracked" illegal versions of our software. There are thousands more of these infringing sites -- simply enter "pixelan cracked" in Google search. :(  Can you remove more than we list? These sites are creating a significant loss of revenue for Pixelan!
